info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Executes a rotation of the bits inside the measure array.
[Parameters] - input data type : not used. - output data type : not used. - measure : input measure. - offset : specify the number of 1-bit movements. If offset>0 then rotate to the right. If offset<0 then rotate to the left. Default value (0) corresponds to no rotation.
[Return type] Bit-array.
[Examples] Execute a 10-bit rotation to the right. oph_bit_rotate('','',bit_measure,10)
